CustomField.description: (R1-S1 by JD): Serves as the Unique Key for the Book List. It is the concatenation of the OpCo, the Year, the Account Customer Number and the ISBN/Order Nr.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Serves as the Unique Key for the Book List. It is the concatenation of the OpCo, the Year, the Account Customer Number and the ISBN/Order Nr.
CustomField.label: Unique Key
